Description: Master list of all available configuration options for WindowsBuildCertificate.
Purpose: Defines all available pre- and post-deployment configuration options, their metadata, and associated function references.

Options.Name: Intune Autopilot Enrolment
Options.Description: Registers device with Intune Autopilot using classic or automated method.
Options.HelpDescription: Automates or guides the process of enrolling the device in Intune Autopilot, supporting both classic and app-based flows.

Options.Name: On-Premises AD Join Check
Options.Description: Checks if the device is joined to On-Premises Active Directory.
Options.HelpDescription: Validates that the device is joined to the organisation's on-premises Active Directory domain.

Options.Name: Azure/Entra AD Join Check
Options.Description: Checks if the device is joined to Azure/Entra Active Directory (cloud or hybrid).
Options.HelpDescription: Validates that the device is joined to Azure/Entra AD, supporting both cloud-only and hybrid join scenarios.

Options.Name: PCR7 Configuration State Check
Options.Description: Checks if PCR7 Configuration State is Bound.
Options.HelpDescription: Validates that the device's PCR7 state is Bound for security compliance.

Options.Name: Device Naming Convention Check
Options.Description: Checks if the device name matches the company naming convention.
Options.HelpDescription: Validates the device name against the configured company naming schema for device type, prefix, and unique number.

Options.Name: gpupdate /force Check
Options.Description: Ensures gpupdate /force is performed the configured number of times.
Options.HelpDescription: Runs gpupdate /force as many times as specified in the configuration for this option.

Options.Name: Intune Device Sync Status Check
Options.Description: Checks if the device has successfully synchronised with Intune.
Options.HelpDescription: Validates that the device has checked in and synchronised with Intune.

Options.Name: Required Applications Installed and Version Check
Options.Description: Checks that all required applications are installed and meet minimum version requirements.
Options.HelpDescription: Validates presence and minimum version of required applications as defined in the associated applications list.

Options.Name: Teams (New) Compliance Check
Options.Description: Ensures Microsoft Teams (new) is installed via approved method and removes legacy versions.
Options.HelpDescription: Checks for Teams (new) installed via AppX/Winget/Store, removes legacy Teams, and validates launch.

Options.Name: User Account Type Check
Options.Description: Checks for non-compliant local user accounts.
Options.HelpDescription: Logs any local user accounts that do not meet compliance requirements for later action.

Options.Name: Group Membership Check
Options.Description: Checks if the user/device is a member of required security groups.
Options.HelpDescription: Logs missing group memberships for inclusion in the build certificate; group list is configurable.

Options.Name: OneDrive for Business Configured Check
Options.Description: Checks that OneDrive is installed, user is signed in, and device is synchronising.
Options.HelpDescription: Attempts to launch/setup OneDrive, waits for user confirmation, and validates sync before marking complete.

Options.Name: Office 365 Activation and Channel Check
Options.Description: Checks that Office is installed, activated, and on the correct build/channel/version.
Options.HelpDescription: Attempts to remediate activation/channel/version, prompts user if needed, and validates compliance.

Options.Name: BitLocker Enabled and Reporting
Options.Description: Checks that BitLocker is enabled, reporting healthy, and recovery key is escrowed if possible.
Options.HelpDescription: Attempts to enable BitLocker, offers user remediation if needed, and logs/report status.

Options.Name: Antivirus/EDR Status Check (Defender)
Options.Description: Checks for presence and status of Microsoft Defender Antivirus.
Options.HelpDescription: Attempts to enable Defender if not present, logs if unable.

Options.Name: Credential Guard Enabled Check
Options.Description: Checks if Credential Guard is enabled and running.
Options.HelpDescription: Attempts to enable via GPO/MDM/registry if configured, logs outcome.

Options.Name: Local Admin Accounts Check (LAPS)
Options.Description: Checks for presence of LAPSadmin account and password rotation.
Options.HelpDescription: Triggers password rotation if not already done, logs if unsuccessful.

Options.Name: Windows Update Compliance Check
Options.Description: Checks for pending updates, feature version, and reboot status; installs updates and prompts for reboot as needed.
Options.HelpDescription: Installs outstanding updates, prompts for reboot, and continues until compliant.

Options.Name: Wi-Fi Profile Compliance Check
Options.Description: Checks for presence of required Wi-Fi profiles and adds if needed.
Options.HelpDescription: Validates and remediates Wi-Fi profiles as per configuration.

Options.Name: Time Zone Compliance Check
Options.Description: Checks and sets time zone as per configuration.
Options.HelpDescription: Attempts to set time zone, validates result, and logs outcome.

Options.Name: Regional Settings Compliance Check
Options.Description: Checks and sets regional settings as per configuration.
Options.HelpDescription: Attempts to set regional settings, validates result, and logs outcome.

Options.Name: Language Pack Compliance Check
Options.Description: Checks and sets language packs as per configuration.
Options.HelpDescription: Attempts to set language packs, validates result, and logs outcome.

Options.Name: Custom Script Execution Check
Options.Description: Allows user to specify and run custom scripts for compliance.
Options.HelpDescription: Runs user-specified scripts and logs result; configuration determines action.
